rooms.description: A spacious living room adjacent to the main entrance with natural light from south-facing windows in alignment with Vastu principles.
Dining area designed with colonial style finishes and complementing the living room layout.
Modern kitchen with an island counter positioned in the northeast corner for positive energy flow, following Vastu guidelines.
Guest bedroom on the ground floor near the entrance to ease accessibility and maintain privacy.
Ground floor bathroom located conveniently near guest room and living areas, designed for functionality.
Well-lit pool area with a swimming pool integrated within the outdoor courtyard, ensuring proper drainage and safety measures as per local building codes.

openings.description: Main entrance with robust colonial detailing and secure access complying with local regulations.
Window near the front door for additional lighting and ventilation, aligned with Vastu to enhance the energy flow.
